20260203_01.title: Official Website Launch
20260203_01.content:
HanabiFuusen's official website is now live!

Welcome! Here we'll share our latest game updates and development progress.

Stay tuned for more!

game01.descriptionKey: "Take Me to the Dungeon!!" is an R18 card game where you play as the protagonist, embarking on a thrilling adventure with the lively and adorable heroine Yuna, challenging the 100-floor dungeon together!
game01.devDetailKey:
Heroine - Yuna (CV: Hanayashiki Yaya)
Mysterious Lady - Mona (CV: Hoshi Rilca)
Mischievous "Demon Lord" - Pamela (CV: Higashi Shizu)

System Requirements
Minimum:
OS *: Windows 7+
Processor: Core 2+
Memory: 2 GB RAM
Graphics: HD620+
DirectX: Version 9.0c
* As of January 1, 2024 (PT), the Steam Client only supports Windows 10 and later versions.

ageVerification.title: Age Verification
ageVerification.warning: This website contains content that may be harmful to minors.
ageVerification.question: Are you 18 years or older?

dungeon.title: Dungeon System
dungeon.description:
Randomly generated underground dungeons with monsters, shops, treasures, rest areas, and story events.
Preview the next three floors and carefully advance to the deepest part of the maze!

battle.title: Card Battle
battle.description:
Over 50 cards and 20 runes to freely combine into the strongest deck and defeat enemies!
If Yuna gets hurt... her clothes might tear?!

treasure.title: Random Treasures
treasure.description: Randomly acquire various treasures during your adventure to strengthen the heroine. You might even get the ultimate treasure combination to deal massive damage!

story.title: Engaging Story & Multiple Endings
story.description:
Enjoy an exciting adventure story where endings depend on your choices.
Unlock different side events that trigger card enchantments upon completion, bringing rewards or penalties.
Fully voiced in Japanese for immersive storytelling!

abyss.title: Abyss Dungeon
abyss.description:
After clearing the main story, unlock the "Abyss Dungeon" - an endless challenge where you can fully enjoy card battles!
Start with a fixed deck and acquire random cards in the dungeon to test your luck and skill!

difficulty.title: Difficulty Settings
difficulty.description:
Enjoy the story casually in easy mode, or challenge yourself in hard mode!
Choose from three difficulty levels so players of all types can find their perfect playstyle.

lovense.title: Lovense Interactive Support
lovense.description:
Supports Lovense device integration for an enhanced interactive experience in adult scenes!
Customize interaction modes in supported scenes to create your own intimate moments.
*Requires additional device support.
